title: 91 - Magic Turkey (w/ Scott Adsit, Live from Chicago Podcast Festival)
description:
It seems like a good time of year to interview a magical turkey.


Credits

Arnie: Arnie Niekamp

Chunt: Adal Rifai

Usidore: Matt Young

Charles the Turkey: Scott Adsit

Spurt the Elder: Andy Carey

Shan Gammador: Shannon Cason

Mysterious Man: Tim Sniffen

Craig: Ryan DiGiorgi


Producers: Arnie Niekamp, Evan Jacover, Ryan DiGiorgi

Editor: Garrett Schultz

Theme Music: Andy Poland

Magic Tavern Logo: Allard Laban

Audio Assistance: Jason Knox

Production Assistance: Garrett Schultz

Live Photo: John H. Abbot


Special Thanks

The Chicago Podcast Festival

Jonathan Pitts

Tyler Greene

The Athenaeum Theatre

Recording Engineer: Mikel Pickett

Live Engineer: Andrew Dallas

Bread and Roses


You can support the show directly and receive bonus episodes and rewards by joining our Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/magictavern for only $5 per month. Follow us on Twitter and Instagram, and now Patreon!
